title: Rammus has the only spell that deal damage to structures
body:
Not including passives and auto-attack proc-ed abilties (like Nasus Q, TF or Kass W), Rammus has the only spell that deals damage to structures (His ult)

Personally I think there should be more, unless it is a big part of Rammus's niche, which I think it isn't

Note: I can't remember the last time there was a Rammus thread, is just an extremely underplayed champ, I see more Galios and Urgots in silver than Rammus

replies.body: His soldiers refuse to attack turrets...

> [{quoted}](name=AlphabetaX1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lNefp6xr,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-11T21:12:02.416+0000)
>
> His soldiers refuse to attack turrets...

You can use the ability to damage towers instead...
Yep basically his W turns into a nuke for towers. Not as great as it was in PBE in which the soldiers could repeatedly attack the turrets for more damage, but good enough.

:) that's a very nice tower you got there

proceeds to destroy outer, inner, inhib, nexus towers and pull a FNC vs OMG when there is 1 hp on nexus
Yeah I edited it almost instantly but was not fast enough
I'd say that is still auto attack proc'ed however you do have a point, before that Rammus had the absolute only structure damaging spell.
